description: Number of minimal covers of an n-set.
references: Hearne and Wagner, Minimal covers of finite sets, Discr. Math. 5 (1973), 247-251.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
formula: G.f.: x^3*(1 + (1-4*x)^(-4) + 3*(1-x)^(-4)). - corrected by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 04 2012Recurrence (for n>3): 4*(n-1)*n*a(n-2)-5*(n-4)*n*a(n-1)+(n-4)*(n-3)*a(n)=0. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 04 2012For n>3, a(n) = n*(n-1)*(n-2)*(4^n+192)/384. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 26 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
